name: bmdb
description: High-performance, ACID-compliant embedded database with WAL optimization, MVCC, and vector search capabilities

scripts.build: bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm && bun run build:types
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --format cjs --target node --outfile dist/index.cjs
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target node --outfile index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build
